title: How to write a good song for my first anniversary - Quora

response.answer_text: think about what you and your significant other has done that year and try to make a rhyme out of it. (ex: when you first kissed me, i felt a surge of ecstasy) if you are stuck on making a tune, if you have a piano, or a xylophone, or an instrument you know how to use, play a few notes and see if you like it.
